channel.title: Cessna 206 on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in Cessna 206 on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Ooops, or how I ripped my container on a Cessna 206, part 1
item.description: My recent visit to the motherland gave me the opportunity for yet another skydiving session, I joined my instructor and mentor Ale≈° Debeljak from the Paranoia skydiving school. All went well and on the third jump of the second day just as I exited the Cessna 206 I apparently managed to hook my rig on the side of the door which resulted in a nasty tear in my container on the reserve parachute flap.
